title: Principles of Analysis
description: Rigorous treatment of analysis theory and applications with emphasis on research methodology.

title: Introduction to Workshop
description: In-depth analysis of workshop principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.

title: Intermediate Methods
description: Advanced exploration of methods covering current research and industry practices.

title: Applied Seminar
description: Comprehensive study of seminar with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.

title: Advanced Seminar
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of seminar. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Research
description: Advanced exploration of research covering current research and industry practices.

title: Practice
description: Fundamental concepts and applications of practice. Designed for students pursuing careers in related fields.

title: Advanced Theory
description: Comprehensive study of theory with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: ENTR 387 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Research
description: In-depth analysis of research principles. Students will develop critical thinking and problem-solving skills.
prerequisites: ENTR 343 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Practice
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in practice. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: ENTR 381 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Graduate Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: ENTR 359 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Methods
description: Examination of key concepts and methodologies in methods. Includes hands-on experience and case studies.
prerequisites: ENTR 315 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Advanced Workshop
description: Comprehensive study of workshop with emphasis on theoretical foundations and practical applications.
prerequisites: ENTR 344 and senior standing or graduate status

title: Special Topics in Applications
description: Interdisciplinary approach to applications combining theoretical knowledge with practical problem-solving.
prerequisites: ENTR 364 and senior standing or graduate status
